comments:
With the 0404N driver + latest from HEAD for Web service, J2EE and server 
tools, when going through Web Service wizard, I got the following exception 
after hitting Next on the 3rd page:

IWAB0491E Error encountered while setting up default values for Java bean
    
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.edit.ClientAccessRegistryException:
 !ClientAccessRegistry_ERROR_1! : 
org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.StructureEdit@ee765
    This exception was generated to indicate an invalid usage of reference 
counts. Please examine the stack trace.
    Client Access Exception of type INVALID_ACCESS_KEY
    
    
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.edit.ClientAccessRegistryException:
 !ClientAccessRegistry_ERROR_1! : 
org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.StructureEdit@ee765
    This exception was generated to indicate an invalid usage of reference 
counts. Please examine the stack trace.
    Client Access Exception of type INVALID_ACCESS_KEY
    
    at 
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.edit.ClientAccessRegistry.complain
(ClientAccessRegistry.java:88)
    at 
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.edit.ClientAccessRegistry.release
(ClientAccessRegistry.java:55)
    at 
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.integration.EditModel.releaseAccess
(EditModel.java:928)
    at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.StructureEdit.dispose
(StructureEdit.java:405)
    at org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.common.J2EEUtils.getFirstWebInfPath
(J2EEUtils.java:916)
    at 
org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.axis.creation.ui.task.DefaultsForServerJavaWSDLComma
nd.execute(DefaultsForServerJavaWSDLCommand.java:148)

Line 148 of DefaultsForServerJavaWSDLCommand is:

webinfPath = J2EEUtils.getFirstWebInfPath(serviceProject_);

So it looks like the there's some invalid usage of reference counts.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
